tuv.seg: Buying or selling a vehicle
Díol nó ceannach feithicle
Buying a new car
Carr nua a cheannach in Éirinn
There are a number of public services associated with buying a new car. What should you know about tax, insurance and registering your new car?
Tá cur síos ginearálta anseo ar na seirbhísí poiblí a bhaineann le carr nua a cheannacht
Buying a used car
Carr athláimhe a cheannach
As cars decline in value over time buying a used car is sometimes a good option when searching for a vehicle. This document tells you what you need to know before you buy a second hand car
Go minic bíonn sé i bhfad níos saoire carr athláimhe a cheannach de bhrí go dtiteann an luach a bhíonn ar charr nua an-tapa ar fad
This document is in: Consumer Affairs > Motoring
This document is in: Gnóthaí Tomhaltóirí > Gluaisteánaíocht
If you sell your car, the Driver and Vehicle Computer Services Division of the Department of Transport, Tourism and Sport must be informed
Má dhíolann tú do charr ní mór duit a chur in iúl don Tiománaithe agus Rannán Seirbhísí Ríomhaireachta Feithicle na Roinne Iompair, Turasóireachta agus Spóirt
Importing a vehicle into Ireland
Carr a iompórtáil go hÉirinn
Find out how to import your car and other motor vehicles into Ireland
Déantar cur síos sa doiciméad seo ar an mbealach le carr a iompórtáil isteach go hÉirinn
This document is in: Moving Country > Moving to Ireland > Coming to live in Ireland
This document is in: Ag bogadh tíre > Teacht go hÉirinn > Teacht a chónaí in Éirinn
Consumer guide to buying a new car
Comhairle maidir le carr nua a cheannach
A new car can be a big investment
Go ginearálta nuair a cheannaíonn tú carr nua in Éirinn is ó dhíoltóir nó ó gharáiste a cheannaíonn tú é
Description of the legal requirements when buying a new car and information on the various finance options
Tá costais bhreise ag baint le carr a cheannach ba chóir a bheadh ar eolas agat sula gceannaíonn tú ceann
This document is in: Consumer Affairs > Motoring
This document is in: Gnóthaí Tomhaltóirí > Gluaisteánaíocht
Normally consumers have no problems renting vehicles but there are ways to minimise any risk of car hire problems, these are described here
Normally consumers have no problems renting vehicles but there are ways to minimise any risk of car hire problems, these are described here
This document is in: Consumer Affairs > Motoring
This document is in: Gnóthaí Tomhaltóirí > Gluaisteánaíocht
How to dispose of an end-of-life vehicle
Conas feithicil a bhfuil a ré caite a dhiúscairt
An end-of-life vehicle is a car or small van which is to be scrapped
Is éard atá i gceist le feithicil a bhfuil a ré caite ná gluaisteán nó veain bheag atá le bheith briste
Find out what you must do if want to dispose of one
Faigh amach cad atá ort a dhéanamh má theastaíonn uait ceann a dhiúscairt

Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Taisteal agus Áineas"
Applying for your first Irish passport
Ag déanamh iarratais ar phas Éireannach
